DetailedDescription: Tarot cards allow you to check a player and get back one of their tarot cards
You will be given two cards in the morning. One will be randomly selected from the player, the other will be randomly selected from a different player in the game

Description: If you are killed at night whilst holding of an Ankh of Possession, you will swap bodies with your killer the following night.
A Disruption Orb will roleblock anyone visiting you that is not Night Immune. Unfortunately it will also roleblock you at the same time

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

Description: Manacles of Spite allow you to roleblock a player each night. If you do, you will also roleblock yourself.

DetailedDescription: A Vahetus Rune allows you to swap avatars with another player.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: This crossbow has certainly seen better days. You should take great care when using it, it looks like it has a 50% chance of backfiring.

A war spear can kill a player at night, but it is heavy and unwieldy so you will roleblock yourself if you choose to use it. It can only be used once. Protection will stop the kill, and if the Huntsman catches you trying to kill someone they are guarding, you will both die.
A Wolf Pelt will protect you from one night kill, but it will make you appear as a Werewolf to the Seer
A Potion of Transmutation can be used to give a player a new role from the faction they belong to. It will not affect Night Immune roles.

An Avleda Rune allows you redirect all visits to a target player to yourself for one night. This includes item usage and item transfers. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

A Töfrar Rune allows you to check a whether a player uses Witch Craft or not. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

The Philosopher's Stone is a legendary item long sought by Alchemists. If you hold it for two consecutive nights it will create a random potion. In addition, it will refresh an Alchemist's ability every three nights. Alchemists can hold more than one of their ability potions but can only use one of each type per night.

DetailedDescription: A Välta Rune allows you to make another player's vote be counted twice tomorrow.
The target will have their faith in democracy shaken by receiving such power and will receive a message about strange dreams.
Holding a Rune will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.

If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

The attack has a separate 66% chance to maim the target
A maimed player has a chance to die if they visit anyone in the night, the chance increases the further away their visit target
You cannot use a war axe and another item on the same night

They have a positive killing status
They make a visit during the night (item passes do not count as visits, but item uses do)
Sleepwalking is considered a visit

Description: Steel Armour will protect you from one night kill.
A Potion of Pollymorph allows you to turn a player into a parrot for the duration of a day
The Ring of Tenacity prevents its bearer from being Roleblocked
A Disruption Orb will roleblock anyone visiting you that is not Night Immune. Unfortunately it will also roleblock you at the same time
A Potion of Transmutation can be used to give a player a new role from the faction they belong to. It will not affect Night Immune roles.
A Potion of Weakness will role block a single target for one night

DetailedDescription: A Vahetus Rune allows you to swap avatars with another player.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Vibra Rune allows you to check what auras a player has.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: Holy Lights must be passed to a different player every night. They will light up if all the people that hold one are pure.

Description: The Dagger may be used once per game. If you choose to activate it, you will kill one randomly selected player that visits you that night. Activating the Dagger will not prevent you from being killed.

DetailedDescription: Tarot cards allow you to check a player and get back one of their tarot cards
You will be given two cards in the morning. One will be randomly selected from the player, the other will be randomly selected from a different player in the game
A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

DetailedDescription: A Vahetus Rune allows you to swap avatars with another player.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
Slay Bells will be heard by the village if a player holding them meets the following criteria:
They have a positive killing status
They make a visit during the night (item passes do not count as visits, but item uses do)
Sleepwalking is considered a visit

Description: Rusty Armour has a 50% chance to protect you from a single attack.
A Potion of Transmutation can be used to give a player a new role from the faction they belong to. It will not affect Night Immune roles.
Holy Lights must be passed to a different player every night. They will light up if all the people that hold one are pure.

Confirmation: The Holy Lights will pass randomly to a different player if you do not choose one yourself $$

Message: Your Holy Lights are not shining. $$

Description: A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has
A Potion of Transference allows you to swap avatars with another player

A war spear can kill a player at night, but it is heavy and unwieldy so you will roleblock yourself if you choose to use it. It can only be used once. Protection will stop the kill, and if the Huntsman catches you trying to kill someone they are guarding, you will both die.
A Wolf Pelt will protect you from one night kill, but it will make you appear as a Werewolf to the Seer
Steel Armour will protect you from one night kill.
Poisoned Darts allow you poison a player. After being poisoned, a player has a 50% chance of being roleblocked and a 25% chance of dying. The poison lasts for 3 nights. You have 3 dart(s) left.
If you are killed at night whilst in the possession of an Ankh of Retribution, your corpse will attack your killer the following night and attempt to kill them

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

Description: A Potion of Clarity allows you to find out a player's role
A Potion of Restoration can be used once to recharge a player's limited use abilities (Revivers, Masons, Witches etc)

DetailedDescription: A Tysta Rune allows you to silence a player, making their vote count as 0 the next day.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: Steel Armour will protect you from one night kill.

DetailedDescription: A war hammer can be used to attack another player, it has a 20% chance of killing them.
The war hammer has a separate 75% chance of causing the target a concussion
A concussed player may accidentally visit a neighbour of their night target, the target and each neighbour all have a 33% chance of being visited
You cannot use a war hammer and another item on the same night

A Potion of Transference allows you to swap avatars with another player

If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

The Philosopher's Stone is a legendary item long sought by Alchemists. If you hold it for two consecutive nights it will create a random potion. In addition, it will refresh an Alchemist's ability every three nights. Alchemists can hold more than one of their ability potions but can only use one of each type per night.

DetailedDescription: A Välta Rune allows you to make another player's vote be counted twice tomorrow.
The target will have their faith in democracy shaken by receiving such power and will receive a message about strange dreams.
Holding a Rune will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.

If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A war axe can be used to attack another player, it has a 33% chance of killing them.
The attack has a separate 66% chance to maim the target
A maimed player has a chance to die if they visit anyone in the night, the chance increases the further away their visit target
You cannot use a war axe and another item on the same night

Description: A Potion of Transmutation can be used to give a player a new role from the faction they belong to. It will not affect Night Immune roles.
A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night

If you are killed at night whilst in the possession of an Ankh of Retribution, your corpse will attack your killer the following night and attempt to kill them
A Disruption Orb will roleblock anyone visiting you that is not Night Immune. Unfortunately it will also roleblock you at the same time

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

Reason: You are feeling altruistic tonight, you should be giving items away, not trying to use them, you selfish git.

DetailedDescription: Slay Bells will be heard by the village if a player holding them meets the following criteria:
They have a positive killing status
They make a visit during the night (item passes do not count as visits, but item uses do)
Sleepwalking is considered a visit

Description: A Disruption Orb will roleblock anyone visiting you that is not Night Immune. Unfortunately it will also roleblock you at the same time

A Fela Rune allows you to make a player invisible for one night, hiding them from Stalker and Harlot checks. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
You can use the Martyr's Crown to divert a kill to yourself. If your target is attacked protection will not save you.
A Potion of Clarity allows you to find out a player's alignment
You can use a Heavy Shield at night to protect you from a normal kill, but you will roleblock yourself. If you are attacked whilst using the shield, it will be destroyed.

DetailedDescription: Tarot cards allow you to check a player and get back one of their tarot cards
You will be given two cards in the morning. One will be randomly selected from the player, the other will be randomly selected from a different player in the game

Description: A Potion of Weakness will role block a single target for one night

A Dölja Rune allows you to cast a shadow over a player for one night, making them appear as an innocent to all intel checks. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
An Iron Collar can save you from a single lynch.
A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night
A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night

DetailedDescription: A war axe can be used to attack another player, it has a 33% chance of killing them.
The attack has a separate 66% chance to maim the target
A maimed player has a chance to die if they visit anyone in the night, the chance increases the further away their visit target
You cannot use a war axe and another item on the same night

Description: Steel Armour will protect you from one night kill.
A Potion of Cleansing can be used to remove all negative effects applied to a player, like Poison

A war spear can kill a player at night, but it is heavy and unwieldy so you will roleblock yourself if you choose to use it. It can only be used once. Protection will stop the kill, and if the Huntsman catches you trying to kill someone they are guarding, you will both die.

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

Description: The Amulet of Peace will roleblock you if you have killing status. It will roleblock anyone that visits you if they have killing status. During the day, your vote will carry no weight. If you hold the amulet and have the most votes, it will save you from being executed. The Amulet of Peace must be passed to a different player each night.

Confirmation: The Amulet of Peace will pass randomly to a different player if you do not choose one yourself $$

Description: The Ring of Tenacity prevents its bearer from being Roleblocked

After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: The Accurrum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated will be shorter than normal
This crossbow has certainly seen better days. You should take great care when using it, it looks like it has a 50% chance of backfiring.
A Wolf Pelt will protect you from one night kill, but it will make you appear as a Werewolf to the Seer

A war spear can kill a player at night, but it is heavy and unwieldy so you will roleblock yourself if you choose to use it. It can only be used once. Protection will stop the kill, and if the Huntsman catches you trying to kill someone they are guarding, you will both die.
A Potion of Transmutation can be used to give a player a new role from the faction they belong to. It will not affect Night Immune roles.

DetailedDescription: A war axe can be used to attack another player, it has a 33% chance of killing them.
The attack has a separate 66% chance to maim the target
A maimed player has a chance to die if they visit anyone in the night, the chance increases the further away their visit target
You cannot use a war axe and another item on the same night

Description: The Dagger may be used once per game. If you choose to activate it, you will kill one randomly selected player that visits you that night. Activating the Dagger will not prevent you from being killed.

Ethereal Armour is so light it's almost like it's not there at all. Although it will not protect from normal attacks, each morning Ethereal Armour will cleanse any negative effects from you (like Poison)
A Potion of Transference allows you to swap avatars with another player
A Veil of Shadows will make you appear innocent to intel roles like the Seer or Witch Hunter
The Ring of Tenacity prevents its bearer from being Roleblocked
A Potion of Weakness will role block a single target for one night

The Dagger may be used once per game. If you choose to activate it, you will kill one randomly selected player that visits you that night. Activating the Dagger will not prevent you from being killed.

An Avslöja Rune allows you to reveal your full role to another player. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Potion of Cleansing can be used to remove all negative effects applied to a player, like Poison
A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has

DetailedDescription: A war hammer can be used to attack another player, it has a 20% chance of killing them.
The war hammer has a separate 75% chance of causing the target a concussion
A concussed player may accidentally visit a neighbour of their night target, the target and each neighbour all have a 33% chance of being visited
You cannot use a war hammer and another item on the same night

Description: An Avslöja Rune allows you to reveal your full role to another player. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Potion of Inebriation can be used to make a player drunk for the rest of the game, giving them a chance to fail to use their night action

The Dagger may be used once per game. If you choose to activate it, you will kill one randomly selected player that visits you that night. Activating the Dagger will not prevent you from being killed.
A Disruption Orb will roleblock anyone visiting you that is not Night Immune. Unfortunately it will also roleblock you at the same time
You can use the Martyr's Crown to divert a kill to yourself. If your target is attacked protection will not save you.
An Iron Collar can save you from a single lynch.
Steel Armour will protect you from one night kill.
A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night

DetailedDescription: A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.

Description: A Hvísla Rune allows you to talk to a player the following night. The other player will see all the messages you send at night but will not know who is sending them. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: A Veil of Shadows will make you appear innocent to intel roles like the Seer or Witch Hunter
Holy Lights must be passed to a different player every night. They will light up if all the people that hold one are pure.

Confirmation: The Holy Lights will pass randomly to a different player if you do not choose one yourself $$

Message: Your Holy Lights are shining. $$
